machines.name: legacy-ftp-server
machines.role: Legacy FTP server hosting sensitive research data with misconfigured permissions

machines.name: attacker-workstation
machines.role: Penetration testing workstation for FTP enumeration and exploitation

dependencies: Attacker must discover FTP server through network scanning
Anonymous FTP access reveals encrypted files that require password cracking
Configuration files contain credentials for privileged FTP access

scenario.title: Research Lab Data Breach
scenario.description: A pharmaceutical research lab's legacy FTP server contains critical drug trial data. The server has been misconfigured, allowing unauthorized access to sensitive encrypted research files and patient databases.
stages: Network reconnaissance to discover the FTP server
Exploit anonymous FTP access to retrieve initial files
Crack encrypted archives to reveal credentials
Use discovered credentials for privileged FTP access
Extract final encrypted flag from restricted directories
